original_text: The Philistines did not take their idols with them when they ran away. David told his men to destroy the idols in a fire.
korean_text: 블레셋 사람이 그들의 우상을 그 곳에 버렸으므로 다윗이 명령하여 불에 사르니라

sentences.original_text: The Philistines did not take their idols with them
sentences.korean_translation: 블레셋 사람들은 그들의 우상들을 가져가지 않았다

sentences.original_text: to destroy the idols in a fire
